title: SSRF Cloud Instances
description:
# SSRF URL for Cloud Instances

> When exploiting Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) in cloud environments, attackers often target metadata endpoints to retrieve sensitive instance information (e.g., credentials, configurations). Below is a categorized list of common URLs for various cloud and infrastructure providers

## Summary

* [SSRF URL for AWS Bucket](#ssrf-url-for-aws)
* [SSRF URL for AWS ECS](#ssrf-url-for-aws-ecs)
* [SSRF URL for AWS Elastic Beanstalk](#ssrf-url-for-aws-elastic-beanst
payloads: The AWS Instance Metadata Service is a service available within Amazon EC2 instances that allows those instances to access metadata about themselves. - [Docs](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/ec2-instance-metadata.html#instancedata-data-categories)
